= Sample Server Configs =

Some pre-configured server.cfg files for quicker server setup.


= Saber Only/No Force Standard = 

{{{
seta sv_hostname "My JKE Server" // Insert your server name here
seta g_motd "JK Enhanced Mod" // Message of the day 
rconpassword "changeme" // Set your RCON password here
seta g_password "" // Set your server password here
seta sv_maxclients "10" // Insert the number of slots your server should have
seta sv_fps "30"

seta logfiles "1"

seta sv_pure "0"

seta sv_allowdownload "0"

seta sv_cheats "0"

seta sv_floodprotect "1"

seta g_needpass "0"
seta sv_maxRate "25000"
seta bg_fighteraltcontrol "0"

seta d_saberkicktweak "1"

seta g_debugmelee "0"

seta g_dismember "0"

seta g_forcebasedteams "0"

seta g_forceregentime "200"

seta g_friendlyfire "1"

seta g_friendlysaber "1"

seta g_gravity "800"

seta g_locationbaseddamage "1"

seta g_maxforcerank "7"

seta g_privateduel "1"

seta g_saberdamagescale "1"

seta g_saberlockfactor "2"

seta g_saberlocking "0"

seta g_saberwalldamagescale "0.4"

seta g_speed "250"
seta g_stepslidefix "1"

seta g_teamautojoin "0"

seta g_teamforcebalance "0"

seta g_autoMapCycle "1"
seta g_allowDuelSuicide "1"

seta g_gametype "0"

seta fraglimit "0"

seta bot_minplayers "3"

seta bot_honorableduelacceptance "1"

seta g_weapondisable "524279"
seta g_duelWeaponDisable "524279"
seta g_forcepowerdisable "163837"

seta disable_item_shield_lrg_instant "1" 

seta disable_item_shield_sm_instant "1"

seta disable_item_medpak_instant "1"

seta disable_item_medpac "1"

seta disable_item_medpak "1" 

seta timelimit "0"

map mp/ffa3

seta g_allowBlackNames "1" 

seta g_allowMultipleDuels "1"

seta g_duelHealthRestore "1"

seta g_duelShieldRestoreLevel "25" 

//EOF
}}}
